text: Walter Nash in the 1950s. This is a summary of the electoral history of Walter Nash, Prime Minister of New Zealand (1957–60), Leader of the Labour Party (1951–63) and Member of Parliament for Hutt (1929–68). ==Parliamentary elections== ===1925 election=== ===1928 election=== ===1929 by-election=== ===1931 election=== Table footnotes: ===1935 election=== ===1938 election=== ===1943 election=== ===1946 election=== ===1949 election=== ===1951 election=== ===1954 election=== ===1957 election=== ===1960 election=== ===1963 election=== ===1966 election=== ==Local elections== ===1929 local elections=== ===1933 local elections=== ===1935 local elections=== ==Leadership elections== ===1940 Deputy-leadership election=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- style="background-color:#E9E9E9" !
